message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.CR 

Reasoning: The paper discusses background modeling and foreground segmentation in videos, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The use of Bayes' rule and likelihood models suggests a machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) approach. The paper also mentions spatial neighborhood and prior modeling, which are relevant to multimedia (cs.MM) and cryptography (cs.CR) sub-categories.
